title: Reflective Thinking-Facilitated Educational Program for Improving Diagnostic Accuracy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language analysis skills and experience interpreting business documents
context.additional_context: Learners Perform Language Data Analysis and Decision-Making Tasks in Real Work Contexts, Collaborating via Platforms on Personal Devices. Aims to Reduce Work Errors and Improve Analytical Accuracy Through Reflective Thinking Training

learning_goals: Learners can identify errors in complex textual materials with over 80% accuracy and apply reflective thinking procedures.
Learners create video tutorials explaining reflective thinking processes to peers and incorporate feedback from three or more peer reviews.
Learners improve diagnostic accuracy by over 25% in real workplace cases during the six-month training period.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
